description: This file defines the interface for the OvsAgent API, providing function declarations for initializing, deinitializing, configuring, and interacting with the OVS Agent. It also includes necessary headers and license information.

methods.name: ovs_agent_api_init
methods.description: Initializes the OVS Agent API, allocating and setting up internal structures and the OVS DB Socket.

methods.name: ovs_agent_api_deinit
methods.description: Deinitializes the OVS Agent API, releasing allocated resources.

methods.name: ovs_agent_api_get_config
methods.description: Retrieves and initializes default configuration data for a specified table.

methods.name: ovs_agent_api_interact
methods.description: Submits a request for interaction with the OVS DB layer and registers a callback for the response.
